column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Diy_coref|
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Diy_coref_re|BT_webanno.custom.Diy_coref
#Text=[0001] My invention is a cyjindrical tube made in two halves with a special interlocking latch at a point where the two halves meet.
#Text=This tube when slid over an existing door closing cylinder and attaches with a common pivoting pin at the door jamb bracket.
#Text=A spring loaded pin is located on the top half of the tube at a point near the full reach of the closing cylinder.
#Text=When the cylinder attains its full reach the spring driven pin moves down past the face of the cylinder and prevents its return.
#Text=To close the door push the door open removing the pressure on the pin and lift and hold the pin as the cylinder returns.
#Text=Constructing the my invention in two halves facilitates both manufacturing and installation.
#Text=[0002] My invention falls in the Classification Definitons under Door Closures.
#Text=In general the air over spring cylinder door closure work well.
#Text=However for many wears a problem with holding the door open conveniently has persisted.
#Text=Currently this is accomplished by sliding a bent washer along the piston rod to contact the face of the cylinder ware the washer tilts and binds the rod with cylinder face as it trys to return.
#Text=This operation requires two hands one to hold the door and one to slide the washer. many fingers have been pinched in this process.
#Text=Two new products are now on the market.
#Text=The first controls the bent washer at the of the cylinder thus when door open position is attained a lever provided tilts the washer and stops the door.
#Text=To close the door the door is opened and a spring returns the washer to its slidable position.

#Text=The second and newest design is a collet clamping device that gripes the piston shaft, this collet is embodied at the cylinder face, A rotatable color is rotated thus locking and unlocking the at the required location.
#Text=The first design is Touch n Hold By national Mfg.
#Text=Co.
#Text=Sterling Ill.
#Text=Made In Romania no patt. no.
#Text=The second design is by Wright Products Rice Lake Ws. also no patt. no. model no. 99308-000 rev-b

#Text=[0003] In closing my design provides what has long been needed 1. a safe mechanism covering 2. options for holding the door open at preset intervals 3. automatic one hand positioning of the door in its full open position with the use of one hand.
#Text=[0004] My invention should be made of molded plastics or other ridged material.
#Text=It should come in as many sizes to accomidate existing door clousers as well designs to come.
#Text=My invention brings to the comminley used cylinder a safe neat aperance with the addition the ability to open and lock a storm door at full open with the use of one hand.
